caption.center: THE STATE OF WASHINGTON, Respondent, v. RICHARD ALLEN RICHARDSON,

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division Two.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for Pierce County, No. 57603, Waldo F. Stone, J., entered November 13, 1980.

opinion_text.unpublished: Affirmed by unpublished opinion per Worswick, J., concurred in by Petrich, A.C.J., and Petrie, J.
